comments:
N20050908-0010

In the nightly build, a JDT/UI test failed with the exception below on macosx
(passed on gtk and win32). We did not change the test in the last few days, and
in N20050907-0010, the test passed on macosx. I'm not aware of any change in
jdt/ui that could have caused a difference for this test.

Widget is disposed

This still happens occasionally in our tests (e.g. in I20051031-0800).
I have put further protection in the async code in builds >20051208. Please reopen if this happens again.
Verified in 20051212-0100 as we have not seen it since.

I'm getting a similar stack trace using the 3.2M4 build.  This occurs when disconnecting from a DB in the Data Source Explorer view supplied by DTP.

If I have time, I will try to put together a more concise example that reproduces the problem.

Here's the stack trace.

The error appears to have gone away with some recent changes.  I was using the monitor passed into the Job when joining a Job family spawned by the Job.  Passing null for the monitor to IJobManager.join(family,monitor) seems to have eliminated the problem.

We'll chaulk this up to user error.

Rob
Marking as WORKSFORME. Please reopen if you see this in 3.3 or later
